item.title: 凯雷首席执行官称公司将零售基金标记为"半流动性"实属失误
item.description: 凯雷集团首席执行官哈维·施瓦茨表示，资产管理公司本应更坦诚地告知个人投资者所购投资基金的相对流动性不足问题。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Harvey Schwartz suggested that asset managers should have been more forthcoming about the relative illiquidity of investment funds sold to individual investors.】

item.title: 《高盾》失败背后的故事
item.description: Wildlight Entertainment推出的《突袭射击》游戏开局前景看好，但玩家流失速度极快。【原文：The ‘raid shooter’ game from Wildlight Entertainment had a promising start but lost players fast】

item.title: 30年期抵押贷款利率自2022年以来首次跌破6%
item.description: 自2022年以来，美国30年期抵押贷款平均利率首次跌破6%，这一里程碑事件或将为即将到来的春季房屋销售旺季注入活力。【原文：For the first time since 2022, the average 30-year mortgage rate in the US has slipped below 6%, a milestone that could breathe life into the coming spring home-selling season.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行寻求押注国内新型国防与能源项目
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行正将目光投向加拿大预计将出现的国防基础设施和能源支出热潮，将其作为资本配置的途径之一。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada is eyeing Canada’s expected boom in defense infrastructure and energy spending as one way to deploy its capital.】

item.title: 拉扎德资深人士将在Bramshill推出专注新兴市场投资的对冲基金
item.description: 拉扎德资产管理公司前新兴市场债务联席主管阿里夫·乔希将加入布拉姆希尔投资公司，协助推出一只专注于发展中国家投资机会的对冲基金。【原文：Arif Joshi, the former co-head of emerging-market debt at Lazard Asset Management, is joining Bramshill Investments LLC to help launch a hedge fund focused on opportunities across the developing world.】

item.title: 州立农场保险公司将向车险客户支付创纪录的50亿美元分红
item.description: 州立农场互助汽车保险公司宣布，在实现强劲承保利润后，将向其汽车保险客户支付50亿美元现金分红。【原文：State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Co. will pay a $5 billion cash dividend to its auto-insurance customers after posting strong underwriting profits.】

item.title: 谷歌推出更快速的病毒式AI图像工具Nano Banana
item.description: 谷歌正推出其热门AI图像生成工具的新版本，旨在更快地生成更优质的视觉内容。此前六个月，该公司曾通过发布初代Nano Banana产品向OpenAI发起挑战。【原文：Google is rolling out a new version of its popular AI image generation tool that’s meant to produce better visuals more quickly, six months after challenging OpenAI with the release of the original Nano Banana product.】

item.title: 欧盟最大港口面临与中国贸易相关地缘政治风险
item.description: 欧洲最大港口警告称，其正日益暴露于与中国贸易相关的地缘政治风险之中。【原文：Europe’s biggest port warned that it’s increasingly exposed to geopolitical risks related to trade with China.】

item.title: 巴克莱、阿特拉斯等机构涉足倒闭的英国贷款机构MFS
item.description: 巴克莱银行和Atlas SP Partners等华尔街金融机构曾协助为一家英国抵押贷款公司安排逾20亿英镑（27亿美元）贷款，而该公司在财务违规指控中已陷入困境。【原文：Barclays Plc and Atlas SP Partners are among Wall Street firms that helped arrange more than £2 billion ($2.7 billion) of loans to a UK mortgage-finance company that has unraveled amid allegations of financial irregularities.】

item.title: 关税与人工智能热潮推动美国最古老铜制品制造商扩张
item.description: 瑞弗铜业公司正加大对美国的投资力度，关税政策与数据中心需求的激增正推动这家美国历史最悠久的铜制造商盈利增长。【原文：Revere Copper Products Inc. is ramping up US investment as tariffs and surging demand from data centers lift earnings at America’s oldest copper manufacturer.】

item.title: 美国称瑞士银行MBaer可能失去金融系统准入权
item.description: 瑞士私人银行MBaer Merchant Bank AG面临失去进入美国金融体系的风险。【原文：Swiss private bank MBaer Merchant Bank AG faces the risk of losing access to the US financial system.】

item.title: 美国国债在拍卖前上涨，科技股重挫
item.description: 美国国债价格上涨，推动长期国债收益率回落至年内低点附近，与此同时美国科技股再度大幅下挫。【原文：Treasuries rose, sending longer-maturity yields back toward their lowest levels of the year, amid a fresh slump in US technology shares.】

item.title: 私人信贷的巨大鸿沟：迫在眉睫的危机还是“无足轻重”
item.description: 即便在私募信贷领域——数月来因几起高调爆雷事件，怀疑论者与坚定支持者持续对峙——过去一周的分歧也达到了新的高度。【原文：Even in the world of private credit, which for months has pitted skeptics against true believers after some high-profile blowups, the difference of opinion has reached new heights in the past week.】

item.title: 英国石油公司大力推进页岩油开采，而众多竞争对手产量停滞不前
item.description: 英国石油公司正大力推进页岩钻探，打破了众多竞争对手的保守策略，这家英国石油巨头试图扭转多年来的产量低迷局面。【原文：BP Plc is aggressively expanding shale drilling, bucking the conservative approach of many rivals, as the UK oil giant seeks to reverse years of anemic output.】

item.title: 希腊争议案件中捕食者间谍软件销售商被定罪
item.description: 四名曾为间谍软件公司工作的管理人员周四被希腊法院定罪，因实施秘密监视行动窃听记者和反对派政客，被判处八年监禁。【原文：Four executives who worked for a spyware company were convicted by a Greek court Thursday and sentenced to eight-year prison terms over a campaign of covert surveillance that eavesdropped on journalists and opposition politicians.】

item.title: 加拿大外国投资激增至2007年以来最高水平
item.description: 第四季度加拿大外国直接投资大幅增长，推动全年流入额达到18年来最高水平。【原文：Foreign direct investment into Canada jumped in the fourth quarter, pushing yearly inflows to the highest level in 18 years.】

item.title: 美国股市小幅走低，英伟达股价下跌，人工智能担忧持续发酵
item.description: 美国股市开盘走低，尽管芯片制造商英伟达公司业绩超出预期，但未能平息投资者对人工智能颠覆性风险以及科技巨头盈利可持续性的担忧。【原文：US stocks slipped at the open, after better-than-expected results from chipmaker Nvidia Corp. failed to quell investor concern about the disruptive risk of artificial intelligence and the sustainability of big-tech company gains.】

item.title: 黑石信贷基金债券发行溢价创2021年以来新高
item.description: 由黑石集团管理的某公开交易私募信贷基金正发行新债券，其发行溢价创五年来新高。此前一天，该基金披露其最大投资项目之一持续出现压力迹象。【原文：A publicly-traded private credit fund managed by Blackstone Inc. is marketing a new bond due with the issuer’s biggest premium in five years, a day after the fund disclosed continued signs of stress in one of its largest investments.】

item.title: 艾瑞尼克对Reservoir Media发起非邀约收购
item.description: 据知情人士透露，激进对冲基金Irenic Capital Management已对独立音乐出版商Reservoir Media Inc.提出非邀约收购要约。该公司的歌曲曲库涵盖琼尼·米切尔、约翰·丹佛和雪儿·克罗等艺人作品。【原文：Activist hedge fund Irenic Capital Management has made an unsolicited offer for Reservoir Media Inc., an independent music publisher whose song catalog features Joni Mitchell, John Denver and Sheryl Crow, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普议程需要盟友坚守美国国债，而其他投资者纷纷撤离
item.description: 美国正日益依赖其最亲密的盟友来为其膨胀的债务负担提供资金，这暴露了30万亿美元美国国债市场的脆弱性。【原文：The US is becoming ever more dependent on its closest allies to fund its swollen debt burden, exposing a vulnerability in the $30 trillion Treasuries market.】

item.title: 博通向富士通交付新型人工智能芯片，计划扩大部署范围
item.description:
新型设计通过堆叠组件提升数据传输效率并节省电力

【原文：

New design boosts data transfer and saves power by stacking components

】

item.title: 拉加德发现欧洲央行员工因缺乏发展机会而心灰意冷
item.description: 欧洲中央银行发现，其员工对职业发展、公平性和透明度感到失望——这种令人不安的状况正值该机构高度依赖员工的专业知识来应对充满挑战的全球环境。【原文：The European Central Bank has found that its staff are disillusioned about professional development, fairness and transparency — a troubling mix as the institution leans heavily on their expertise to navigate a challenging global environment.】

item.title: 加拿大法院因外汇交易案斥责证券监管机构
item.description: 法院判令加拿大监管机构向模拟交易公司MyForexFunds支付创纪录的法律费用，该公司的资产已被冻结逾两年。法院同时表示，对加拿大监管机构调查该平台的行为并不满意。【原文：A court awarded record legal costs to MyForexFunds, a simulated trading firm whose assets had been frozen for more than two years, and said it was unimpressed with the conduct of the Canadian regulator investigating the platform.】

item.title: 美国假日周初请失业金人数小幅上升至21.2万
item.description: 上周美国失业救济申请人数增幅低于预期，表明裁员规模仍处于相对较低水平。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose by less than expected last week, indicating that layoffs remain relatively low.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚债券与比索汇率下跌，左翼候选人塞佩达大幅领先
item.description: 周四哥伦比亚美元债券收益率曲线全面走低，比索领跌新兴市场货币。此前最新民调显示，左翼参议员伊万·塞佩达在总统竞选中大幅领先。【原文：Colombia’s dollar bonds fell across the curve on Thursday and the peso led emerging-market losses after a new poll showed leftist Senator Iván Cepeda with a wide lead in the race for the presidency.】

item.title: eBay正裁员约800人，占全球员工总数的6%
item.description: 易趣公司正裁减约800个职位，占其全职员工总数的6%，称此次裁员旨在使员工队伍与战略重点保持一致。【原文：EBay Inc. is cutting about 800 jobs, or 6% of its full-time employees, saying the layoffs are needed to align its workforce with strategic priorities.】

item.title: 汇丰银行凯特纳大幅削减美国股票配置，青睐全球其他地区
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司策略师将美国股票超配比例减半，转而配置新兴市场及欧洲市场，因其经济动能强劲。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc strategists halved their US equity overweight, rotating into emerging markets and Europe amid strong economic momentum.】

item.title: 自2022年以来，英国房主境遇比租房者更糟
item.description: 最新数据显示，近年来英国按揭房主承受的经济压力远大于租房者，这充分揭示了高利率带来的财务冲击。【原文：British homeowners with mortgages have suffered a bigger squeeze than renters in recent years, according to new data that lays bare the financial hit from high interest rates.】

item.title: 金融科技公司Plaid最新融资轮估值达80亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国最大金融科技公司之一Plaid Inc.在最新融资轮中获得了80亿美元估值。【原文：Plaid Inc., one of the US’s biggest financial technology firms, secured an $8 billion valuation in its latest funding round, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：英伟达、Celsius、Janus Henderson、Nubank
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7点46分，标普500指数期货基本持平，因英伟达财报未能点燃市场对人工智能的新热情。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures are little changed as of 7:46 a.m. in New York as earnings from Nvidia failed to spark new enthusiasm about AI.】
